txt.en:
Bounty: Bel Inzûl Proto-huorn

The ruins atop Bel Inzûl are unsafe. They remain unsafe due to the huorn menace that likely brought them to ruin.

Slaughter the menace and return to Bel Inzûl's healer for reward.

Do not go alone.
Speak with the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl
You defeated the menace among the ruins. Return to the healer at the outpost on Bel Inzûl to claim your reward.
You accepted a bounty for defeating the proto-huorn stalking the ruins at the top of Bel Inzûl.
'The huorn no longer stalks the ruins? This news is most welcome. Please, accept your reward.\n\n'We thank you, friend. Killing the creature makes our efforts on the island much safer.'
You defeated the Bel Inzûl proto-huorn
Gather a fellowship and make your way to the ruins atop of Bel Inzûl. Defeat the Bel Inzûl proto-huorn.
